Item.Line: Hello, what brings you to this city?
I want to be a conductor, so I am travelling around to recruit players for my ensemble.
Then you must have heard of the international conducting competition.
I have heard of it, but I am not sure what it is about.
It is held in Vienna, which is not too far from here.But to be qualified to enter the competition, you must first get recognition from four of the six grand masters.

Okay, listen carefully. From Milan you can reach six different cities, each guarded by one of the six grand masters. Two of them love the symphony, two of them love the opera, and the other two love the concerto.
They will give you a letter of recommendation if you can please them with your music. Remember, you only need play for four out of the six grand masters!

By the way, I think you will need a larger ensemble in order to impress the grandmasters. How about this, I will let my two grandsons join your ensemble, and you will promise me to win the conducting competition?
(Bruce Lee and his brother have joined your ensemble!)
